name: Original BBQ Sauce - 18 oz
description:
This sauce works great as a marinade or just brushed on at the time of grilling. Keep a bottle at the table for extra flavor. Hamburgers, tofu, and veggie kabobs, all benefit from the use of the Original Howling Wolf BBQ sauce.

The Howling Wolf line of gourmet BBQ sauces are made in small batches using the finest ingredients available. All of the premium Frontier brand spices used are non-irradiated and have the fullest flavors which contribute to each of the sauces great tastes.

This sauce contains no unnecessary fillers or high fructose corn syrup.

18 oz

name: Extra Spicy BBQ Sauce - 18 oz
description:
Howling Wolf Extra Spicy BBQ sauce is a version of the original with a little more kick. If you want a sauce that makes you sweat, but leaves your taste buds in one piece, this is the sauce for you. The blend of chilies used brings on the heat, but still retains all of the flavor.

The Howling Wolf line of gourmet BBQ sauces are made in small batches using the finest ingredients available. All of the premium Frontier brand spices used are non-irradiated and have the fullest flavors which contribute to each of the sauces great tastes.

This sauce contains no unnecessary fillers or high fructose corn syrup.

18 oz

name: Cranberry Orange BBQ Sauce - 18 oz
description:
This sauce is fruity, tangy, and sweet, with a nice kick at the end. For a change of pace, try it on chicken, salmon, pork, duck, or wild game. Baste meat before, during, and after grilling for maximum flavor.

The Howling Wolf line of gourmet BBQ sauces are made in small batches using the finest ingredients available. All of the premium Frontier brand spices used are non-irradiated and have the fullest flavors which contribute to each of the sauces great tastes.

It is fast becoming one of our most popular sauces!

18 oz

name: Howling Wolf BBQ Sauce Mixed Case of 12 bottles
description:
You know you love our sauces, so why not keep some on hand for unique last minute gift giving? These sauces make great hostess presents. Mix and Match flavors in the case however you want. If not specified, you will receive 4 of each flavor. (Original, Extra Spicy, Cranberry Orange) SHIPS FOR FREE! (Offer available only to the lower 48 United States.)  

18 oz bottles

See our blog for other recipe ideas.
http://bbqhq.blogspot.com
